section.name: Analysis
section.definition: Sections of the Analysis type can be used to describe analyses.

property.name: Author
property.definition: The name of the person who did the analysis, e.g. 'John Doe' or 'Doe, John'

property.name: Description
property.definition: A general description of the analysis.

property.name: Method
property.definition: The name of a method used in this analysis. E.g. "power spectrum".

property.name: CommandlineCall
property.definition: The command used to execute the analysis including the command line parameter.

property.name: CodeFile
property.definition: The program code to analyse the data can be transferred using this property. Using it will blow up the the size of the metadatafile and we recommend to rather define the URL of underlying code file.

property.name: CodeFileURL
property.definition: The URL of the applied piece of program code to actually do the analysis.

property.name: CodeRevision
property.definition: If the analysis code is under version control the revision number can be specified using this property.

property.name: ConfigFile
property.definition: The configurations used to analyse the data can be transferred using this property. Using it will blow up the the size of the metadatafile and we recommend to rather define the URL of underlying configuration file.

property.name: ConfigFileURL
property.definition: The URL of the used configuration file used to run the analysis.

property.name: DatasetFile
property.definition: The data analysed in the described way can be transferred using this property. Using it will blow up the the size of the metadatafile and we recommend to rather define the URL of underlying dataset file.

property.name: DatasetFileURL
property.definition: The URL of a analysed datasetFile.

property.name: ResultFile
property.definition: The results of this analysis can be transferred using this property. Using it will blow up the the size of the metadatafile and we recommend to rather define the URL of the results file.

property.name: ResultFileURL
property.definition: The URL of a results file.

property.name: ResultFigure
property.definition: A figure showing the results. This property is meant to store the real figure content. This will blow up the the size of the metadatafile and we recommend to rather define the URL of the figure.

property.name: PaperDOI
property.definition: If the results of this analysis have been published one can store the doi of the paper.

property.name: PaperURL
property.definition: If the results of this analysis have been published the URL of the document can be given here
